metadata.title: CVE-2024-35812 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: usb:cdc-wdm: close race between read and workqueue wdm_read() cannot race withitself. However, in service_outstanding_interrupt() it can race with theworkqueue, which can be triggered by error handling. Hence we need to makesure that the WDM_RESPONDING flag is not just only set but tested.

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
